projects.title: Canadian Historical GIS
projects.description: The Canadian Historical GIS project offers access to maps and data from Canadian censuses, allowing users to explore, map, and download statistical information about Canada's evolution from the 19th to the 20th century. Users can dynamically generate, map, and download data on population, demographics, housing, agriculture, and more.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
